text: Thousands of our joint customers

are relying on SAP
services and AWS services
to run their mission critical processes,
which is why we have been choosing AWS
to bring SAP HANA Cloud onto Graviton.
Running SAP on AWS means for our customers

that they basically
benefit getting solutions
from a leader on enterprise applications,
technologies like databases,
to run on a leader on the cloud server
and cloud infrastructure side.
Bringing SAP HANA Cloud onto AWS Graviton
is just an example.
From business point of view,

the results that we are seeing
in the actual deployment

is an up to 35% price
performance improvement
for analytical workloads.
And if you look at the sustainability side
and the energy efficiency side,

running workloads of HANA
Cloud on AWS Graviton,
we have an estimate of 45% improvement
on the energy efficiency.
We're able to run first tests

of running SAP HANA Cloud
on Graviton4 as well.

We see quite an improvement on
the overall performance side,

and specifically, on the
transactional performance.
There's more advancements to come,
and we are also looking forward to
new innovations and new joint projects
that we can be doing.
